facebook_share: I think you would love this game. Try it out and see how good you are!
facebook_score: I've scored #i points playing at #s!!! Try and beat this score if you can!
add_to_home: Add this game to your Home, so, you can back playing it in full screen.

howToPlay_desktop.p1:
Control the hero by using keyboard arrows keys.

Press P key for pausing the game
howToPlay_desktop.p2: Pay attention, don't get touched by ghosts.
howToPlay_desktop.p3: Collect all the coins to finis the level.
howToPlay_desktop.p4: Power-up pill give you temporary ability of defeat enemies.

howToPlay_mobile.p1: Move the hero by swiping in the four directions.
howToPlay_mobile.p3: Collect all the coins to finis the level.
howToPlay_mobile.p4: Power-up pill give you temporary ability of defeat enemies.
